p: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 (GAD-7) is a brief questionnaire developed for screening purposes by Spitzer et al. ( 16). This tool is intended to measure the severity of symptoms of anxiety. We used a Polish translation of the questionnaire available on the Patient Health Questionnaire website ( 17). This measure has been linguistically validated by the MAPI Research Institute ( 18) in accordance with the international standards of cultural adaptation methodology described in the Linguistic Validation Manual for Health Outcome Assessments ( 19) and ISPOR guidelines for the cross-cultural adaptation ( 20).
